amendment.description: To authorize the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to reimburse the Town of Chincoteague, Virginia, for costs directly associated with the removal and replacement of certain drinking water wells.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3039 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3039 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 3748. To authorize the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to reimburse the Town of Chincoteague, Virginia, for costs directly associated with the removal and replacement of certain drinking water wells.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3039 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3039 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
